context.title: Friedman Test
context.description:
Use the Friedman Test to find the length of the key used to encrypt a Vigen√®re-encrypted text.
After analyzing a text with a click on the main button, a graph should appear, which, by expectation, shows recurring peaks with a period of n. Find out n, which is the key length.
It is possible to interact with the graph by zooming (in: left mouse button click; out: right mouse button click) and dragging.
